column3: School of Engineering and Applied Sciences
column5: Civil Engineering Course OverviewCivil Engineering at Swansea University has an excellent and far-reaching reputation. The MSc in Civil Engineering provides an advanced and systematic understanding, designed to prepare you as a credible civil engineer.You will be trained in civil engineering analysis and design, particularly in modelling and analysis techniques – fields in which Swansea University experts fundamentally changed modern industrial practice in civil engineering.
column7: Please visit our website for the Civil Engineering course fee information.
